name: HELMICOL 3031
description: Helmicol 3031 is a two-component solvent-free, epoxy nose caulking adhesive formulated for use with rubber and vinyl stair treads. Helmicol 3031 is designed to fill the void between the nosing of the stair tread and the nosing of the step. Helmicol 3031 may also be used to permanently install luxury vinyl tile and plank flooring, resilient sheet vinyl flooring, rubber tile flooring and rubber sheet flooring and rubber and vinyl stair treads. Helmicol 3031 has been formulated to produce a superior, hard setting bond required for use in high traffic applications. May be used over properly prepared porous and non-porous surfaces such as concrete, underlayment grade plywood, cementitious based patching compounds and levelers.
